segments.text: Credit Services , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to apply for a credit card with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would that be our standard card , our gold card , or our platinum card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm not sure . What's the difference ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the standard card has a lower credit limit , that's 20,000 RIB , whereas with the platinum card you can have a credit limit of 80,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's all about credit rating and salary . If your credit rating and your salary are high enough , we can offer you the platinum card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My salary is pretty high and I've never had a problem with my credit rating in the past . Are there any perks of the platinum card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have contracts with various luxury shops and health clubs , where if you use the card to purchase items from them , you can get some healthy discounts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great ; my health club membership is about to expire .
segments.speaker: S2
